about_the_game:
This DLC contains a set of wallpapers and avatar icons of PARTY RUSH!!

We've prepared three different wallpapers using the key visuals and designs of the daily lives of our characters.
In addition, there will also be 20 avatar icons of the characters that can be used in Steam and in various social media.
Try them out on your PC and smartphone!


- 3 wallpapers for PC
1920x1080 (.png)
- 3 wallpapers for smartphone
1080x2337 (.png)
- 20 avatar icons for Steam profile
184x184 (.png)
- 20 avatar icons for social media
400x400 (.png)

Note:
- The downloaded file will be included in the following folder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 98, XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 High Color +
